Search all you want, there are no English-written biographical notes or reviews of this artist or this album on the net. Even the social media links are really just empty place holders. Unfortunate, because this album of gorgeous Afro-mediterranean sound is worth raving about. The Zerrad Trio's blend of instruments and talent is perfect for making true World music of the highest order. The most info you will find is on the French-only zerrad.fr site, but the best introduction to the trio and its members is the well-produced EPK video (it's in French, of course, but worth a look even if you're not fluent).
